page.title: 19Tourist Accomodation
page.content: In Alderney there are twelve hotels - nine of them are fully licensed and two residential and restaurant licensed.The number of hotel beds is 226 though in winter most of the hotels close.All the guest houses together can sleep 106 people.Self catering has become increasingly popular and 16 people and businesses have property available.There is a very attractively sited camping site which is reasonably priced though facilities are rather limited.Tents can be hired at the site. Many visitors in the summer are relatives of people living on the island and stay as their guests.Even more important every year are the people who sail in and bring their own accomodation with them(their boats!)
